title: Intramural End of Season 2021
name: intramural
brief: Picture dumps from this year's intramural soccer tournament at Georgia Tech.

The first time playing the captain of this team, we made it into the playoff stage of the tournament. Although not the best result our team has achieved, the team had lots of new blood so there are rooms for improvement. And most importantly, everyone enjoyed the game.

content.source: After the cancellation of intramural sports last year due to the pandemic, we are so excited that it's coming back this year. As a tradition at Georgia Tech, many international students would form a team with people from the same country to represent their nation. Because of the large Chinese population at Georgia Tech, historically we always have a Chinese team participate in the intramural soccer tournament.

This year I was selected as the captain since I helped organizing many soccer-related events throughout the past year. We formed a team of 20 people and named it "Local Panda". (same team name as the previous years)
